it.polimi.ingsw.ps42.model

Class Table

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • it.polimi.ingsw.ps42.model.Table

  • public class Table
extends java.util.Observable
    This is the Table Class Necessary to group all the useful Model Classes
    Author:
    Luca Napoletano, Claudio Montanari

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Table(Player player1, Player player2)
      The most simple construct for a 2-players match Construct a table with only 2 market positions and with 1 yield position and 1 produce positon
      Table(Player player1, Player player2, Player player3)
      The constructor used for a 3 player match, construct a table with market with only 2 positions
      Table(Player player1, Player player2, Player player3, Player player4)
      The first constructor for the table, to construct the full table
